document_data.mainbody:
Along the Wheel of Fates is a one round adventure module set in the Living City organized play program and the final installment of the Tarot series of modules. It was published in 1998, and is intended for adventurers of all levels.Notably previous installments of the Tarot series of modules, The Stars and Moon Above and Light in the Lovers Eye, both mislabeled Along the Wheel of Fates as being the fourth installment of the series. The correct sequencing was finally provided in the fourth installment, The Rogue of the World.
 ()
